scenario_3_params(x) = {
probability: x.scenario_3_probability,
expected_change_in_smc_funding: 0,
non_philanthropic_actor_value: x.counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_domestic_government
}
scenario_3(x) = scenario(x, scenario_3_params(x))
plot_all(scenario_3)

dictMap(x, f) = Dict.fromList(map(Dict.keys(x), {|key| [key, f(key, x[key])]}))

plot_all(f) = { distributions: map(["Burkina Faso"], {|region| {name: region, distribution: f(mc_params[region])}})}
plot_param(p) = plot_all({|x| x[p]})
show_all(f) = dictMap(mc_params, f)
show_param(p) = show_all({|x| x[p]})
show_param_mean(p) = show_all({|x| mean(x[p])})
global_mean(f) = (f(mc_params["Burkina Faso"]) + f(mc_params["Togo"]) + f(mc_params["Chad"]) + ((f(mc_params["Nigeria"]) + f(mc_params["Oyo, Nigeria"]) + f(mc_params["FCT, Nigeria"])) / 3) + f(mc_params["Mozambique"])) / 5

0

arbitrary(x) = x
uncertain(x, y) = x <= 0 ? 0 : lognormal({mean: x, stdev: y / 1.6})
beta_stdev = {
  proportion_of_annual_direct_malaria_mortality_occurring_in_high_transmission_season: 0.1,
  rate_ratio_for_malaria_cases_intention_to_treat_effect: 0.05,
  percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_malaria_consortium: 0.1,
  percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_other_philanthropic: 0.01, 
  percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_domestic_goverments: 0.01,
  internal_validity_adjustment_smc: 0.05,
  external_validity_adjustment_smc: 0.005,
  adjustment_to_account_for_higher_proportion_of_people_being_covered_in_the_trial_than_in_targeted_population: 0.1,
increase_in_income_from_reducing_point_in_time_probability_of_malaria_infection_from_1_to_0_for_an_individual_for_one_year_between_the_ages_of_0_and_14: 0.005,
  additional_replicability_adjustment_for_relationship_between_malaria_and_income: 0.1,
  double_treatment: 0.005,
  ineffective_goods: 0.005,
  goods_purchased_and_left_in_storage_until_they_expire_slash_cash_doesnt_reach_recipients_or_is_taken_back_from_them_inappropriately: 0.005,
  misappropriation_without_monitoring_results: 0.005,
  untrue_monitoring_results: 0.005,
  change_of_priorities: 0.005,
  non_funding_bottlenecks: 0.005,
  within_org_fungibility: 0.01,
  scenario_1_probability: 0.005,
  scenario_3_probability: 0.005, 
  scenario_3_expected_change_in_smc_funding: 0.005
}

lognormal_uncertainties = {
  under_5_mortality_rate_from_malaria_per_100000_child_years: 2,
  average_number_of_smc_cycles_per_year: 0.1,
  cost_per_smc_cycle_administered: 0.2,
  mortality_rate_from_malaria_in_each_month_of_life_for_1_to_2_month_olds_compared_to_3_to_11_month_olds: 0.1,
  ratio_of_the_reduction_in_malaria_mortality_to_the_reduction_in_malaria_incidence: 0.2,
  duration_of_long_term_benefits_of_smc_in_years: 0.15,
  scenario_2_probability: 0.1,
  scenario_4_probability: 0.1,
  scenario_1_expected_change_in_smc_funding: 0.1,
  scenario_2_expected_change_in_smc_funding: 0.1,
  scenario_4_expected_change_in_smc_funding: 0.1,
  value_assigned_to_increasing_ln_consumption_by_one_unit_for_one_person_for_one_year: 0.5,
  value_assigned_to_averting_the_death_of_an_individual_5_or_older_from_malaria: 0.5,
  value_assigned_to_averting_the_death_of_an_individual_under_5_from_malaria: 0.5,
  counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_domestic_government: 0.001,
  counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_the_global_fund: 0.01,
}

normal_uncertainty = {
  drug_resistance: 0.01,
  counterfactual_mortality_rates: 0.01,
  serious_adverse_events_due_to_side_effects_of_treatment: 0.01,
  failure_to_ingest_first_day_of_treatment_of_smc: 0.01,
  long_lasting_insecticide_treated_net_distributions_not_accounted_for_in_gbd_2019_estimates: 0.01,
  marginal_funding_goes_to_lower_priority_areas: 0.01,
  malaria_morbidity: 0.01,
  short_term_anemia_effects: 0.01,
  investment_of_income_increases: 0.01,
  rebound_effects_slash_decreased_immunity_development: 0.01,
  treatment_costs_averted_from_prevention: 0.01,
  subnational_adjustments: 0.01,
}

correlate_with(x, y, p) = x /  mean(y) * y * normal(1, p)
rest(x) = {
  total_malaria_deaths = SampleSet.fromDist(x.malaria_deaths_all_ages_gbd * lognormal({mean: 1, stdev: 1 / 1.6 / 10}))
  malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9 = correlate_with(x.malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05)
  malaria_prevalence_age_10_to_14 = correlate_with(x.malaria_prevalence_age_10_to_14, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05) 
  {
    estimated_coverage_in_trials_considered_in_givewells_meta_analysis: (uncertain(0.18, 0.1) * uncertain(0.9701, 0.7)) + (uncertain(0.21, 0.1) * uncertain(0.9541, 0.03)) + (uncertain(0.22, 0.1) * uncertain(0.8297, 0.11)) + (uncertain(0.19, 0.1) * uncertain(0.9635, 0.06)) + (uncertain(0.02, 0.1) * uncertain(0.9707, 0.05)) + (uncertain(0.17, 0.1) * uncertain(0.757, 0.17)),
    ratio_of_indirect_malaria_deaths_per_direct_malaria_death: beta({mean: (0.5 / 1.1), stdev: 0.25}) * 1.1,
    reduction_in_malaria_incidence_for_treated_population_in_cisse_et_al_2016: 0.54 to 0.64,
    reduction_in_malaria_incidence_for_untreated_population_in_cisse_et_al_2016: 0.18 to 0.33,
    average_number_of_years_between_program_implementation_and_the_beginning_of_long_term_benefits: uncertain(10, 0.2),
    multiplier_for_resource_sharing_within_households: uncertain(2, 0.5),
    discount_rate: SampleSet.fromDist(beta({mean: 0.04, stdev: 0.01})),
    number_of_under_5_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: correlate_with(x.number_of_under_5_deaths_from_malaria_per_year, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05),
    number_of_early_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: correlate_with(x.number_of_early_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05),
    number_of_late_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: correlate_with(x.number_of_late_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05),
    number_of_post_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: correlate_with(x.number_of_post_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year,total_malaria_deaths, 0.05),
    malaria_deaths_all_ages_gbd: total_malaria_deaths,
    malaria_prevalence_age_1_to_4: correlate_with(x.malaria_prevalence_age_1_to_4, total_malaria_deaths, 0.05),
    malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9: malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9,
    malaria_prevalence_age_10_to_14: malaria_prevalence_age_10_to_14,
    malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_14: malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9 + malaria_prevalence_age_10_to_14,
    population_in_country_age_1_to_4: lognormal({mean: x.population_in_country_age_1_to_4, stdev:  x.population_in_country_age_1_to_4 / 32}) ,
    population_in_country_age_5_to_14: lognormal({mean: x.population_in_country_age_1_to_4, stdev:  x.population_in_country_age_5_to_14 / 32}) ,

  }
}

dictMap(x, f) = Dict.fromList(map(Dict.keys(x), {|key| [key, f(key, x[key])]}))
mc_params = dictMap(givewell_params, {|country, gw_params| {
  lognormal_params = dictMap(lognormal_uncertainties, {|key, v| uncertain(gw_params[key], v)})
  beta_params = dictMap(beta_stdev, {|key, v| gw_params[key] == 0 ? 0 : (gw_params[key] == 1 ? 1: beta({mean: gw_params[key], stdev: v}))})
  normal_params = dictMap(normal_uncertainty, {|key, v| gw_params[key] == 0 ? 0 : normal({p5: gw_params[key] - v, p95: gw_params[key] + v})})
  Dict.merge(normal_params, Dict.merge(beta_params, Dict.merge(lognormal_params, rest(gw_params))))
}
})
0

malaria_consortium_cost(x) = cost_per_child_treated_with_all_cycles_of_smc(x) * x.percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_malaria_consortium
other_philanthropic_actors_cost(x) = cost_per_child_treated_with_all_cycles_of_smc(x) * x.percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_other_philanthropic
domestic_government_cost(x) = cost_per_child_treated_with_all_cycles_of_smc(x) * x.percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_domestic_goverments
total_costs(x) = malaria_consortium_cost(x) + other_philanthropic_actors_cost(x) + domestic_government_cost(x)
plot_all(total_costs)

scenario_1_params(x) = {
probability: x.scenario_1_probability,
expected_change_in_smc_funding: malaria_consortium_expenditure(x) + other_philanthropic_actors_expenditure(x),
non_philanthropic_actor_value: x.counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_domestic_government
}
scenario_1(x) = scenario(x, scenario_1_params(x))
plot_all(scenario_1)

scenario_2_params(x) = {
probability: x.scenario_2_probability,
expected_change_in_smc_funding: malaria_consortium_expenditure(x) + other_philanthropic_actors_expenditure(x),
non_philanthropic_actor_value: x.counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_the_global_fund
}
scenario_2(x) = scenario(x, scenario_2_params(x))
plot_all(scenario_2)

scenario_4_params(x) = {
probability: x.scenario_4_probability,
expected_change_in_smc_funding: - domestic_government_expenditure(x),
non_philanthropic_actor_value: x.counterfactual_value_of_spending_from_domestic_government
}
scenario_4(x) = scenario(x, scenario_4_params(x))
plot_all(scenario_4)

total_adjustment_factor_intervention_adjustments(x) = 1 +(x.malaria_morbidity + x.short_term_anemia_effects + x.investment_of_income_increases + x.rebound_effects_slash_decreased_immunity_development + x.drug_resistance + x.treatment_costs_averted_from_prevention + x.subnational_adjustments + x.marginal_funding_goes_to_lower_priority_areas + x.counterfactual_mortality_rates + x.serious_adverse_events_due_to_side_effects_of_treatment + x.failure_to_ingest_first_day_of_treatment_of_smc + x.long_lasting_insecticide_treated_net_distributions_not_accounted_for_in_gbd_2019_estimates)
plot_all(total_adjustment_factor_intervention_adjustments)

malaria_consortium_expenditure(x) = arbirtrary_donation_to_mc

other_philanthropic_actors_expenditure(x) = other_philanthropic_actors_cost(x) / malaria_consortium_cost(x) * malaria_consortium_expenditure(x)

domestic_government_expenditure(x) = domestic_government_cost(x) / malaria_consortium_cost(x) * malaria_consortium_expenditure(x)

total_expenditure(x) = malaria_consortium_expenditure(x) + other_philanthropic_actors_expenditure(x) + domestic_government_expenditure(x)
plot_all(total_expenditure)

params(x) = {
  { percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_malaria_consortium: x["Percentage of total program costs covered by Malaria Consortium"],
    percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_other_philanthropic: x["Percentage of total program costs covered by other philanthropic actors"],
    percentage_of_total_costs_covered_by_domestic_goverments: x["Percentage of total program costs covered by domestic governments"],
    cost_per_smc_cycle_administered: x["Cost per SMC cycle administered"],
    average_number_of_smc_cycles_per_year: x["Average number of SMC cycles per year"],
    rate_ratio_for_malaria_cases_intention_to_treat_effect: x["Rate ratio for malaria cases (intention to treat effect)"],
    estimated_coverage_in_trials_considered_in_givewells_meta_analysis: x["Estimated coverage in trials considered in GiveWell's meta-analysis"],
    number_of_under_5_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: x["Number of under-5 deaths from malaria (per year)"],

    number_of_late_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: x["Number of Late neonatal (7-27 days) deaths from malaria (per year)"],
    number_of_post_neonatal_deaths_from_malaria_per_year: x["Number of Post neonatal (28-364 days) deaths from malaria (per year)"],
    mortality_rate_from_malaria_in_each_month_of_life_for_1_to_2_month_olds_compared_to_3_to_11_month_olds: x["Mortality rate from malaria in each month of life for 1-2 month olds compared to 3-11 month olds"],
    under_5_mortality_rate_from_malaria_per_100000_child_years: x["Under-5 mortality rate from malaria (per 100,000 child years)"],
    malaria_deaths_all_ages_gbd: x["Malaria deaths, all ages (GBD)"],
    malaria_prevalence_age_1_to_4: x["Malaria prevalence (Age 1-4)"],
    malaria_prevalence_age_5_to_9: x["Malaria prevalence (Age 5-9)"],

    average_number_of_years_between_program_implementation_and_the_beginning_of_long_term_benefits: x["Average number of years between program implementation and the beginning of long-term benefits"],
    double_treatment: x["Double treatment"],
    ineffective_goods: x["Ineffective goods"],

    untrue_monitoring_results: x["False monitoring results"],

    non_funding_bottlenecks: x["Non-funding bottlenecks"],

  }
}

  {
    internal_validity_adjustment_smc: x["Internal validity adjustment  SMC"],
    external_validity_adjustment_smc: x["External validity adjustment  SMC"],
